name: Call of the Void
description: Complete a mission, get info on your missing brother. That's the deal.Find a way inWere you able to find a key? Do you have a set of lock picks? Are you willing to break the lock and risk the repercussions?Cover your tracksPut things back where they belong, close the cupboards, lock the door behind you.Don't get caughtManage your anxiety, disable the alarm, dodge the security guard and get out before someone gets home.Complete the missionBreak into the computer, unlock the safe, do what you have to in order to get the item of interest, place the evidence or get the information needed to complete the mission.Make the CallWill you report them to the police? Expose them to the press? Help them? Hire them? Make a deal?UpgradeImprove your crafting tools, upgrade your lock picks, learn to stay calm under pressure.ExploreMaybe you'll find some interesting information to help you or others.
